entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Blazor component event handling to Blazor SSR #56104
  • "No authentication handlers are registered" but there is one #56103
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #56099
  • Expand `AddPackageFixer` to multiple packages #56092

Closed

  • Perf regression: plaintext #56012
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json #56030
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, updates #56094
  • MapOpenApi() Response.ContentType=null causes garbled characters in Chinese and other languages #56095
    9.0-preview6
  • Blazor InputSelect does not select the value when using SSR #53167
    9.0-preview6
  • Allow the encoder to split headers across frames #4722
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Strange unicode characters added to DOM #56069
  • Blazor multiple @page with parameters on Home component results in missing static files #56072
  • Perf improvement: mvc #56088
  • Quarantine HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval #55297

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Build From Source example #56105
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for OpenAPI schema transformers #56093
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Remove references to obsolete storage account variables #56102
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.32
  • [release/8.0] Remove references to obsolete storage account variables #56101
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.7
  • Remove references to obsolete storage account variables #56100
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Set content type for OpenAPI JSON document #56097
    area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview6
  • Pass through CancellationToken when writing OpenAPI response #56096
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview6
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview6
  • Unquarantine `HeartbeatLoopRunsWithSpecifiedInterval` #56091
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc
  • Retry CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesFromMultipleConnectionsWithSameUser #55955
    area-infrastructure
  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    area-signalr, NativeAOT
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Remove redundant check #55945
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Remove dot that is added to URL #56075
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
